content.html: Very interesting. Just 11 months ago, Robinhood proudly announced they are a remote-first company. I am now hearing they are trying to get people into the office "organically". If you work there, would love to hear what is happening and how well this post you think will age.
content.value:
Very interesting. Just 11 months ago, Robinhood proudly announced they are a remote-first company.

I am now hearing they are trying to get people into the office "organically".

If you work there, would love to hear what is happening and how well this post you think will age.

photo.alt:
January 12, 2022
Robinhood is a Remote First Company

We are excited to announce that Robinhood will be staying primarily remote. In December we shared with our employees that our mission to democratize finance for all starts with our people, and that means bringing in and supporting
